tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE discussions (
    discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    classroom_id INT,
    discussion_topic VARCHAR(255),
    discussion_date DATETIME,
    FOREIGN KEY (classroom_id) REFERENCES classrooms(classroom_id)
);

CREATE TABLE VirtualClassroom (
  classroom_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  class_name VARCHAR(50),
  class_schedule TIMESTAMP,
  teacher_id INT,
  capacity INT
);

CREATE TABLE Webinar (
  webinar_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  webinar_topic VARCHAR(50),
  webinar_date DATE,
  speaker_id INT,
  max_participants INT
);

CREATE TABLE OnlineDiscussion (
  discussion_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  discussion_topic VARCHAR(50),
  discussion_date TIMESTAMP,
  moderator_id INT,
  participant_count INT
);

CREATE TABLE webinars (
   id INT PRIMARY KEY,
   webinar_title VARCHAR(255),
   start_time TIMESTAMP,
   end_time TIMESTAMP,
   speaker_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE virtual_classrooms (
    classroom_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    classroom_name VARCHAR(255),
    instructor_id UUID,
    start_time TIMESTAMP,
    end_time TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE webinars (
    webinar_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    webinar_title VARCHAR(255),
    scheduled_date DATE,
    start_time TIME,
    end_time TIME
);
